name: Vaultwarden
title: Vaultwarden
description: Self-hosted Bitwarden-compatible password manager. Lightweight alternative to Bitwarden with full client compatibility.

env.label: Admin Token
env.name: ADMIN_TOKEN
env.description: Admin panel access token (generate with: openssl rand -base64 48)

note: Lightweight Bitwarden server with SQLite (WAL mode). Compatible with official Bitwarden clients. Use admin panel to generate invitation links for family members.
